price: Da hoćemo, u svaki grad bismo poslali nekog da opominje,
arabic: وَلَوۡ شِئۡنَا لَبَعَثۡنَا فِي كُلِّ قَرۡيَةٖ نَّذِيرٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaw shi'nā labaʿathnā fī kulli qaryatin nadhīran
